TopicTitle: How to remove poll from thread?

Articles.Content: I may be the dumbest and blindest person alive, but I can't find where to remove the poll from my mod page. I visited every single corner of the thread settings but I can't find it. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Moving this over to the Kerbal Network.

Only admins can remove polls, drop a request in [this thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/25176-Need-a-Thread-Moved-Removed-or-Closed-or-a-Post-Deleted) and the next one to see it will take care of it (I'd do it but regular moderators don't have the necessary privileges).
